import { React, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "../footer/Footer"; export default function Inspect({isScrolled}) { const [furniture, setFurniture] = useState({}); const [isTargetInViewport, setIsTargetInViewport] = useState(false); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const response = await fetch(`https://haus-db.onrender.com/furnitures/${id}`); const data = await response.json(); setFurniture(data); }; fetchData(); },[]) return (

13 ? 'small-font' : 'big-font'}> {furniture.name}

USD {furniture.price && furniture.price.toLocaleString()}

Add to Cart

{furniture.designer}

Material

{furniture.material}

Dimensions

{furniture.dimensions}

Origin

{furniture.origin}

hi

) }
